article_node.title: 2 Soaring Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold Forever
article_node.summary: Microsoft and Shopify have outperformed broader equities this year, driven by Microsoft’s booming cloud and AI businesses and its solid dividend program, and Shopify’s successful turnaround through price hikes and logistics cuts that have revived revenue growth and margins. Both companies exhibit strong growth prospects, moat, and long‑term potential, positioning them as attractive “forever stocks.” The article highlights Microsoft’s significant contracted revenue, cloud dominance over Amazon, and robust cash flow, while noting Shopify’s expanding U.S. e‑commerce market share and network effects. Investors are encouraged to consider these firms for long‑term growth and income, though the Motley Fool also promotes other top picks through its Stock Advisor service.
